name: Resident at The Garage at Northwestern University
desc: Managed the startup 'hymn' as a part of the residency program at the Garage.

name: IEEE Northwestern University Chapter
desc: Served in various different positions including, Social Chair, Project Manager and President. Created a game using Unity, and two applications using React Native.

name: Northwestern University
desc: Graduated from Northwestern University's McCormick School of Engineering with a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science & Psychology.

name: Ulus Private Jewish Schools
desc: Finished in the top 5% of his year as the student body president. Completed the science track.
